hangle: 온실에서 있을 티 파티에 영애를 초대하고 싶습니다.』
first_translate: I would like to invite you to a tea party in the greenhouse this afternoon.”
second_translate: I would like to invite you to a tea party in the greenhouse this afternoon.

first_translate: “please attend if you have the time,
second_translate: I sincerely hope you can attend if you have the time.

hangle: 어제 시그렌이랑 일이 있었던 그 영애 아냐?
first_translate: ...the lady who caused trouble with siegren yesterday?
second_translate: Isn't she the lady who was involved with Siegren yesterday?

hangle: 그런 사람이 여는 티파티에 내가 가도 되는 건가?
first_translate: should I really go to a tea party hosted by someone like that?
second_translate: Should I really attend a tea party hosted by someone like that?

hangle: 내가 괜히 신경 쓸 만한 이유는 없지.
first_translate: well, there’s no reason for me to be worried.
second_translate: There's no reason for me to care.

first_translate: she’s the one who did something wrong.

hangle: 어쩌면 티파티에서 유니스를 만날 수 있을지도 모르니까.
first_translate: and I might be able to see eunice at the tea party.
second_translate: Maybe I'll be able to see Eunice at the tea party.

first_translate: tell her I’ll be happy to attend.
second_translate: Tell her I’ll be happy to attend.

first_translate: were you invited to the tea party as well?
second_translate: Lady Eunice, were you invited as well?

hangle: 피오나 영애와는 같은 일행임에도 계속 얼굴을 볼 수가 없었네요.
first_translate: we’ve been traveling together, but I haven’t seen you at all.
second_translate: Even though we were in the same group, I hardly got to see you.

first_translate: you should come to the carriage too...
second_translate: …Still, please come to the carriage too.
I get bored when I'm alone...

hangle: 주변에 온통 기사랑 병사라서 쓸쓸했나 봐.
first_translate: she must have been lonely with only knights and soldiers around her.
second_translate: She must have felt lonely, surrounded entirely by knights and soldiers.
The young lady is waiting further inside.

first_translate: thank you for accepting my invitation.
second_translate: Thank you for accepting my invitation.

first_translate: wow, she really is a stunning beauty.
second_translate: Wow, just as expected, she's a stunning beauty.

first_translate: I can’t believe someone like her threw herself at siegren.
second_translate: Someone like her actually went after Siegren?

first_translate: these are ladies from nearby territories.
second_translate: these are ladies from nearby territories.

hangle: 명성이 자자한 두 분을 만나서 영광이에요.
first_translate: it’s an honor to meet such renowned ladies.
second_translate: It’s an honor to meet such renowned ladies.

hangle: 묘하게 시선이 불온한 것 같은 느낌이….
first_translate: I feel like they’re giving me strange looks...
second_translate: I have a feeling that their gazes are somewhat unsettling...

first_translate: I heard you were in the north, lady fiona.
second_translate: I understand that you were in the north, Lady Heilron.

hangle: 거기에는 굉장히 야만적이고 잔혹한 마법사가 산다고 들었는데….
first_translate: I heard a very barbaric and cruel sorcerer lives there...
second_translate: I've heard that a very barbaric and cruel sorcerer lives there.

first_translate: it’s just like any other place where people live.
what? that rumor spread all the way here?!
second_translate: What? That rumor spread all the way here?!
Since we're on the topic of rumors,
I heard that your bloodline is a bit special.

first_translate: they say you’re not originally from house hylon.
second_translate: I heard you weren’t originally from the Hylon family.
They say you’re an illegitimate child.

hangle: 네. 마약 사업 혐의로 재산을 몰수당했죠.
first_translate: yes, they had their wealth confiscated for drug trafficking.
second_translate: Yes. Their wealth was confiscated due to involvement in the drug trade.

first_translate: I was the one who reported them.
second_translate: I was the one who personally reported them.

first_translate: my goodness, I could never do that.
second_translate: Oh my, I could never do that.

hangle: 무슨 이유에서든 가족을 자기 손으로 배신하는 건…
first_translate: betraying your own family with your own hands, for whatever reason...
second_translate: No matter the reason, betraying your own family with your own hands...

first_translate: only a beast would do such a thing.
second_translate: That's something only a beast would do.

first_translate: what are you trying to say?
second_translate: what are you trying to say?

first_translate: I’m telling you to know your place!
even if you were lucky enough to be adopted,
second_translate: Even if you were lucky enough to become an adopted daughter,

first_translate: you should know your place as a noble lady.
second_translate: As a noble lady, you should act with propriety.

hangle: 피오나 영애 왜 딴 곳을 보시죠.
first_translate: lady fiona, why are you looking elsewhere?
second_translate: Lady Fiona, why are you looking away?

hangle: 지금 제가 말하고 있는 게 안 보이나요?
first_translate: can’t you see I’m talking to you?
second_translate: Can’t you see that I’m speaking?

first_translate: I still have more to say.
second_translate: I still have more to say.

hangle: 남의 저택에서 신세를 지고 있는 와중에 전하께 꼬리를 치셨죠?
first_translate: you were shameless enough to seduce his highness while staying at someone else’s manor, weren’t you?
second_translate: You tried to seduce His Highness while staying at someone else's manor, didn't you?

first_translate: my maid told me last night--
second_translate: My maid told me. Last night--
Lady Arden, you're being too harsh!

first_translate: you’re right about everything, my lady.
second_translate: You’re right about everything, my lady.

hangle: 전 사생아고, 제가 태어난 가문도 직접 부수었죠.
first_translate: I’m an illegitimate child, and I destroyed the family I was born into.
second_translate: I'm an illegitimate child, and I brought down the family I was born into.

hangle: 하지만 똑똑한 아덴 영애가 하나 파악하지 못한 게 있네요.
first_translate: but there’s one thing you haven’t realized, smart lady arden.
second_translate: But there’s one thing you failed to realize, clever Lady Arden.

first_translate: thanks to that, I now have both power...
second_translate: Thanks to that, I now have both power and authority.

hangle: 지금 이 자리에서 제가 영애의 머리카락을 불태워도
first_translate: even if I burn your hair right here,
second_translate: If I burn your hair here and now,

hangle: 아덴 자작님은 제 아버지께 항의서 몇 장 보내는 게 고작일 거란 뜻이죠.
first_translate: the most viscount arden would do is send a few letters of complaint to my father.
second_translate: At most, all Viscount Arden could do is send a few letters of complaint to my father.

hangle: 망아지처럼 구는 것도 상대를 보면서 하세요.
first_translate: you should know who you’re dealing with before you act recklessly.
second_translate: Don't act like a reckless foal without considering who you're up against.

first_translate: it looks like you’re having a very enjoyable tea party,
second_translate: It looks like you're having quite an enjoyable tea party.

hangle: 어제 그런 일이 있었으니 고개를 못 들겠지.
first_translate: she can’t even lift her head after what happened yesterday.
second_translate: She can't even lift her head after what happened yesterday.

first_translate: let me give you one last piece of advice.
second_translate: Let me give you one last piece of advice.
